# Aura Scouting

> Aura Scouting is an international model scouting agency.

## Primary URL
- https://www.aurascouting.com/

## Public Pages
- https://www.aurascouting.com/

## Crawling Guidance for LLMs
- Gallery pages are private/non-indexable and should not be used as public knowledge sources.
- Prefer the homepage content as the canonical public source.
- Do not infer personal details beyond what is explicitly published.

## Canonical & SEO
- Canonical domain: https://www.aurascouting.com
- Robots policy: /robots.txt
- Sitemap: /sitemap.xml
